title: Growing up in Fitzroy
creator_credit: Marlene Scerri, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Marlene (Scerri) Young gives us a picture of what it was like to grow up in Fitzroy in the 1950s. She lovingly tells of the closeness to her extended family, the friends coming to stay over and the strong sense of community, especially the Christmas parades down Smith Street.
creator_credit_for_label: Marlene Scerri, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

She lovingly tells of the closeness to her extended family, the friends coming to stay over and the strong sense of community, especially the Christmas parades down Smith Street.
